newsitem.title: USA: Active Apparel concerned about stock price.
newsitem.headline: Active Apparel concerned about stock price.

text.p: Active Apparel Group Inc is "very concerned" about the drop in the company's stock price and is investigating the situation, the company's chief executive said in a letter to shareholders.
"I personally have never sold one share of my stock and continue to believe very strongly in the future of this company," George Horowitz wrote in the letter.
He also said Apparel added Everlast women's bathing suits to its product line.
Apparel's stock plummeted to 8 from about 15 in heavy volume in the week of May 19 to 23.
Apparel was trading Wednesday afternoon at 5-1/8, up 1/16.
